exceptions.tactic: intros net H1 H2 H3 p h t ll e H4 H5 H6 H7 H8 H9 H10 H11.
apply H3 with (e:=e) in H4; auto.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
lltsi: leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface
eewci: every_entry_was_created_interface
llcei: leaderLogs_candidate_entries_interface
cci: cronies_correct_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface

Goal:
forall net : network, leaderLogs_candidateEntries net -> votes_correct net -> cronies_correct net -> forall (p : packet) (h : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry) (e : entry), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In e ll -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply (eTerm e) true -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = eTerm e -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (pSrc p :: votesReceived (snd (nwState net (pDst p))))) = true -> type (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) <> Candidate

Premises:
leaderLogs_candidateEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry) (t : term) (ll : list entry), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In e ll -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : Raft
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
term = nat : Set
pDst = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, pDst, _) := p in pDst : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.name Arguments pDst {P params}
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
votes_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => one_vote_per_term net /\ votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct net /\ currentTerm_votedFor_votes_correct net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votes_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
Record leader_sublog_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leader_sublog_interface { leader_sublog_invariant_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leader_sublog_invariant net } Arguments leader_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leader_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
cronies_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => votes_received_cronies net /\ cronies_votes net /\ votes_nw net /\ votes_received_leaders net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments cronies_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.msg Arguments pBody {P params}
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Notation currentTerm := (RaftState.currentTerm term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
nwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (nwPackets, _) := n in nwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> list packet Arguments nwPackets {P params}
pSrc = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (pSrc, _, _) := p in pSrc : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.name Arguments pSrc {P params}
Record votes_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_votes_correct_interface { votes_correct_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> votes_correct net } Arguments votes_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_votes_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}

leaderLogs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : electionsData) => let (_, _, _, leaderLogs, _) := e in leaderLogs : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), electionsData -> list (term * list entry) Arguments leaderLogs {orig_base_params raft_params}

intros net H1 H2 H3 p h t ll e H4 H5 H6 H7 H8 H9 H10 H11.
apply H3 with (e:=e) in H4; auto.

apply H1 in H4.
auto.
